channel.title: Comments on: Where The Hell are we and Who? WTF, Are we there yet?
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description:
#COnquestofDough #DumaberandDouma https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1133258284109111296 Beating the ban stick whilst politicians beat the meat. The Real Slog @Joe Blob20 ‏
@JoeBlob20 11h11 hours ago More From Die Zeit's analysis of the eurelections: 'Every political creed is in the majority somewhere'. Doesn't sound like much of a recipe for federalism, does it? @thequentinletts @afneil @NickFerrariLBC @MichelleDewbs @MrHarryCole @RichardWellings @Khazi88 @JandJNaylor
item.content:encoded:
#COnquestofDough #DumaberandDouma https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1133258284109111296 Beating the ban stick whilst politicians beat the meat. The Real Slog @Joe Blob20
‏

@JoeBlob20
11h11 hours ago
More
From Die Zeit’s analysis of the eurelections:
‘Every political creed is in the majority somewhere’.
Doesn’t sound like much of a recipe for federalism, does it?
@thequentinletts @afneil @NickFerrariLBC @MichelleDewbs @MrHarryCole @RichardWellings @Khazi88 @JandJNaylor

item.title: By: “As X famously observed . . .”,A big tweet from a “twattering” class, Foghorns, Loudhailers, echo chambers and Milkshakes. Rinse and Repeat! Aphorisms, Uk EU Elections 2019 even less relevant than the EU Eu Elections 2019 . – RogersL
